creditline: Gift of Elissa and Paul Cahn
description: red wool panel with thin blue stripes on outer edges and in center; thin green bands along the side edges and in the center with thick brown bands in between; four hexagon shapes in cream and brown bands of dye in all four quadrants; staggered bands of blue color surround hexagon shapes; blue threaded band around outer edge; blue fringe in all four corners; small cloth tag sewn in corner; has a Velcro heading band
title: Third phase variant
